items.title: LLMs Vs. Geolocation: GPT-5 Performs Worse Than Other AI Models

items.title: The Open Source Tool That Has Preserved 150,000 Pieces of Online Evidence
items.summary: Bellingcat’s Auto Archiver is a tool aimed at preserving online digital content before it can be modified, deleted or taken down.
